name: Move the Block: Slide Puzzle
description:
Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age. Play for FREE now!

"Move the Block : Slide Puzzle" is a simple and addictive sliding block puzzle game.
Perfectly solve stages without using hints and get 3 stars and a super crown!

HOW TO PLAY
• Need to move the red block to the exit.
• Horizontal blocks can be moved from side to side.
• Vertical blocks can be moved up and down.

FEATURES
• Hundreds of levels
• Established a hint system helping you to solve puzzles
• Reset/Undo buttons to help you figure out each puzzle
• Smooth and delicate animation
• Great sound effects
• Try to enjoy the "Move the Block : Slide Puzzle" with iPhones, iPads and iPod Touches.

E-MAIL
• contact@bitmango.com

HOMEPAGE
• https://www.bitmango.com

FACEBOOK
• https://www.facebook.com/BitMangoGames

Contact us if you have any questions, ideas for improvements or experience any bugs when playing the game.

NOTES
• [Move the Block : Slide Puzzle] contain ads like banner, interstitial and video ads.
• [Move the Block : Slide Puzzle] is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like AD FREE and in-game currency to buy hints alike.

Enjoy "Move the Block : Slide Puzzle"

Thank you.
